description: Erection of a new two storey educational building to the rear of the site with a single storey link, with internal and external alterations / modifications associated with the refurbishment of the former police station to accommodate an educational use (Class F.1a), together with a new lift to the former police station, landscaping, plant, cycle parking, car parking and other associated works.(This is a Grade II  Listed Building - Police Station With Walls and Gate Piers To Side)(Affects the setting of other Listed Buildings; Council Offices Grade II, Fellowship House Grade II, Technical College Grade II, Newham Council Offices Grade II*, Wall To East Ham Town Hall, Technical College and Library Turning Corner Down High Street South To The Council Offices Grade II, Public Library Grade II and The Denmark Arms Public House Grade II)(Affects setting of other Locally Listed Buildings)(The site falls within East Ham Town Centre Conservation Area)
